text: Hello! I'm working with a copy of POWER theme and stuggle with the module called "SUB IMAGE BOXES" ..When hovering on the card only parts of the card is clickable, is there a way to make the whole card clickable? I've been trying to mess around with the code but can't fint the solution and are to scared that I will mess something up :sweat_smile:
Hi Maia, I am one of the creators of the POWER theme. I can help you with that and will write you a DM.

Hi HubSpot team! I’m currently using the Focus theme for my website at <http://roguerose.com|roguerose.com>. When I view on my mobile the header is just a black bar.

I chatted with HubSpot support and they said: “I’ve inspected the page and it looks like there is a CSS code in the stylesheet for the module or theme that is set to black for mobile. You’ll want to adjust this code to correct the mobile view. I recommend reaching out to our *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack|Community Developer Slack Group>* or our *<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Developers/ct-p/developers|Developer Forums>* for further assistance on where to make the exact changes”

**How can I update the header on mobile to show my logo and not a black bar?
Hi <@U03PJPQBXCP>! In your css you can remove the background color:
It is a theme setting that is being set for the mobile header background color and you could set that to white instead of black and that would fix it
<@UF6MG8UH1> thank you! I don’t see how to get to the CSS. I went to Settings > Website > Pages > Templates, but see no CSS option?
Hello <@U03PJPQBXCP> There is an option in the theme setting (Mobile > Container Background) by using that you can change the header bg color for mobile.
